revised_title: Observations on Viper Bites and the Efficacy of Salads Oil as an Antidote
tldr: This article describes the author's observations and experiments on the effects of viper bites on humans and animals. The author investigates the use of salad oil as a potential antidote and shares his findings on the treatment and recovery process. The article also discusses the potential risks and limitations of self-experimentation with venomous creatures.
